title: Instructional Design Based on Manifold Learning for Curved Surface Data Interpolation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of linear algebra, calculus, and 3D spatial geometry concepts
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment enabling pre-service teachers to understand mathematical modeling techniques and apply them in real educational settings

learning_goals: Explain the process of transforming 3D surfaces into 2D planes using manifold learning algorithms (LLE, HLLE, LTSA)
Numerically evaluate interpolation accuracy of surface data with dimensionality reduction techniques
Write a project report applying surface interpolation techniques to fluid-structure interaction simulations
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
